messages.subject: wants you to check out The Last Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Your friend thought you would love all the stuff on the Last Samurai movie player. Watch the movie trailer
messages.messageBody:
<http://lastsamurai.warnerbros.com/buzztone/?ori=35>

Your friend thought you would love all the stuff on the Last Samurai
movie player. Watch the movie trailer and learn about Japanese culture
in the Tranquility Garden.

Click here <http://lastsamurai.warnerbros.com/buzztone/?ori=35> to get
started

The Last Samurai - In movie theatres on December 5th

If you do not see a popup window in a few seconds, go here:
http://lastsamurai.warnerbros.com/buzztone/
<http://lastsamurai.warnerbros.com/buzztone/?ori=35>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
